job.description: ltpgtthe national security agency in texas is hiring for the following positions and many more at httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjoblistingsagencynsa ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtsoftware engineer httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescriptionltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtsoftware engineer httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescriptionltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtsoftware engineer httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescriptionltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtnetwork manager httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescriptionltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtcyber network professional offensivedefensive httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescriptionltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtcontact me if you determine nsa in texas may be a great fit for your professional career especially if you already possess a cifs p if youve already applied for a position with us please let me know so i can connect some of the dots for you from a recruiter and hiring manager perspective cheers gregltpgt
